column5: Does anyone know how to get in touch with the owner of North Shore Lodge on Eagle Lake? I want to book a trip for next year but nobody answers the e-mails I've sent, and the number on their web site has been disconnected. Thanks.

Here is the info I have North Shore Lodge: summer: 807-755-2441 winter: 773-794-0545 (631-5872) 800-979-9779 Web site: www.northshorelodgeontario.com e-mail: [email protected] Hope this helps. One of the phone numbers should work.
